message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced split.  It's important we reach an agreement soon, as the value decreases with each round.
I've considered your previous offer and I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle. However, I still believe I deserve a bit more. Let's settle this before the value drops further!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The money is literally vanishing as we argue. My last offer is more than fair, take it or leave it.
